topic.title: how to create a site without clone?
topic.body: For example, I would like to create a site including pics, text and video. How to do one by one step?

1_1Ja2gA7t3Kc2CLL5GgVGr7pJTmTxdVygmS.body:
I put coffeescript to the js directory, but it doesn't work, not be compiled to js. The updated howtos on github is written in 2015, maybe too old to work?
> [erkan](#comment_140_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): see step2 here: go into that directory and for doing " pics, text and video" you can just use HTML (search the internet for html howtos).You can also program in coffeescript/JS (search also for howtos)

ok, I have create a simple html page on http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KrUy59UbnVMDJfGjivdmHWEnmos1TU6Ej
very simple.
but I was stuck on this step: `•Add <script type="text/javascript" src="js/all.js" async></script> line right before </body> in index.html file to automatically compile and merge all .coffee file within the js directory to a single all.js file.` 
It doesn't work.
> [erkan](#comment_143_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): step by step...First, make a simple, static html site: so you know all is working well on your endLater we can progress to the "higher levels"
